text: Phurbu & Tenzin () is a 2014 Chinese historical drama film directed by Fu Dongyu. ==Cast== *Lawang Lop *Ngawang Rinchen *Sonam Dolgar *Yang Xue *Duobujie ==Reception== ===Box office=== The film earned at the Chinese box office. ===Accolades=== {| class="wikitable sortable" width="90%" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! title: Phurbu & Tenzin
